rule_formulation.true: The sentence expresses a positive sentiment.
rule_formulation.false: The sentence expresses negative, neutral, or no sentiment.

true_samples: The sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow on the picturesque beach
I am so grateful for the kindness and support of my friends and family
The newlyweds looked deeply into each other's eyes, overflowing with love and happiness
The performance of the young pianist was exceptional, evoking a standing ovation from the audience
The delicious aroma of freshly baked cookies filled the entire house, making everyone's mouth water
false_samples: The rainy weather ruined our plans for the picnic
I don't have a preference for either option
He didn't show any emotion when he received the news
The book I read last night was quite dull
The meeting ended without any significant decisions made
